name: DUNGEON LORD (kusanagi_red)
description:
DUNGEON LORD

Welcome to the dungeon, traveler.... here, only despair awaits you.

How will you survive the DUNGEON? Well, use your head and maybe you'll do just fine.

CHALLENGE THE DANGER THAT LIES WITHIN AND BECOME THE DUNGEON LORD!!!!!!!!!!

SPACE or X - ATTACK

ARROWS - MOVE
